original: 指派<color=#fff999>$leader1</color>挑撥<color=#fff999>$country1</color>針對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>進行<color=#c0f5ff>借刀殺人</color>
text: Assign <color=#fff999>$leader1</color> to provoke <color=#fff999>$country1</color> to <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> to <color=#c0f5ff> kill with a knife</color>
